title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
fullTitle: The Return of Sherlock Holmes (TV Series 1986â€“1988)

episodes.title: The Devil's Foot
episodes.plot: While convalescing in Cornwall, a depressive Holmes investigates the apparent death from apoplexy of a local woman and the unexplained sudden dementia of her two brothers.

episodes.title: Silver Blaze
episodes.plot: Holmes investigates the disappearance of a champion racehorse and the murder of its trainer on a lonely moor.

episodes.title: Wisteria Lodge
episodes.plot: A bored Holmes eagerly accepts a case involving the disappearance of an amateur Spanish cartographer as well as his servants from his rented country lodge.

episodes.title: The Bruce Partington Plans
episodes.plot: Sherlock's brother Mycroft enlists his younger sibling to locate missing patent plans that pertain to a strategically critical state-of-the-art submarine.

episodes.title: The Hound of the Baskervilles
episodes.plot: Sir Charles Baskerville was found dead with a horrible expression on his face after seeing a mysterious demonic spirit of a gigantic hound that has haunted his family. Dr Mortimer visits Sherlock Holmes to save Sir Henry the heir of the Baskerville estate and to solve the mystery of the demonic curse before it's too late.
